avm-res-apimanagement-service.rules: For cloud resource of API Management Service: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-apimanagement-service/azurerm");

avm-res-app-containerapp.rules: For cloud resource of Container App: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-app-containerapp/azurerm");

variables.container_app_environment_resource_id: `container_app_environment_resource_id` should be set with a variable;

avm-res-app-job.rules: For cloud resource of App Job: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-app-job/azurerm");

avm-res-app-managedenvironment.rules: For cloud resource of App Managed Environment: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-app-managedenvironment/azurerm");

avm-res-appconfiguration-configurationst.rules: For cloud resource of App Configuration Store: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-appconfiguration-configurationstore/azure");

avm-res-authorization-roleassignment.rules: For cloud resource of Role Assignment: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-authorization-roleassignment/azurerm");

avm-res-automation-automationaccount.rules: For cloud resource of Automation Account: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-automation-automationaccount/azurerm");

avm-res-avs-privatecloud.rules: For cloud resource of AVS Private Cloud: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-avs-privatecloud/azurerm");

avm-res-azurestackhci-cluster.rules: For cloud resource of Azure Stack HCI Cluster: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-azurestackhci-cluster/azurerm");

avm-res-azurestackhci-logicalnetwork.rules: For cloud resource of AzureStackHCI logical network: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-azurestackhci-logicalnetwork/azurerm");

avm-res-azurestackhci-virtualmachineinst.rules: For cloud resource of Stack HCI Virtual Machine Instance: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-azurestackhci-virtualmachineinstance/azurerm");

avm-res-batch-batchaccount.rules: For cloud resource of Batch Account: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-batch-batchaccount/azurerm");

avm-res-cache-redis.rules: For cloud resource of Redis Cache: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-cache-redis/azurerm");

avm-res-cdn-profile.rules: For cloud resource of CDN Profile: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-cdn-profile/azurerm");

variables.diagnostic_settings: `log_groups` must be set to empty if `log_categories` is not empty in `diagnostic_settings`; at least one of `workspace_resource_id`, `storage_account_resource_id`, `marketplace_partner_resource_id`, `event_hub_authorization_rule_resource_id` must be set in `diagnostic_settings`;

avm-res-cognitiveservices-account.rules: For cloud resource of Cognitive Service: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-cognitiveservices-account/azurerm");

avm-res-compute-disk.rules: For cloud resource of Compute Disk: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-compute-disk/azurerm");

avm-res-compute-diskencryptionset.rules: For cloud resource of Disk Encryption Set: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-compute-diskencryptionset/azurerm");

avm-res-compute-gallery.rules: For cloud resource of Azure Compute Gallery: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-compute-gallery/azurerm");

avm-res-compute-hostgroup.rules: For cloud resource of Host Groups: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-compute-hostgroup/azurerm");

avm-res-compute-proximityplacementgroup.rules: For cloud resource of Proximity Placement Group: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-compute-proximityplacementgroup/azurerm");

avm-res-compute-sshpublickey.rules: For cloud resource of Public SSH Key: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-compute-sshpublickey/azurerm");

avm-res-compute-virtualmachine.rules: For cloud resource of Virtual Machine: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-compute-virtualmachine/azurerm");

variables.account_credentials: `generate_admin_password_or_ssh_key` must be set to false if `ssh_keys` is output;

avm-res-compute-virtualmachinescaleset.rules: For cloud resource of Virtual Machine Scale Set: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-compute-virtualmachinescaleset/azurerm");

avm-res-containerinstance-containergroup.rules: For cloud resource of Container Instance: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-containerinstance-containergroup/azurerm");

avm-res-containerregistry-registry.rules: For cloud resource of Azure Container Registry (ACR): it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-containerregistry-registry/azurerm");

avm-res-containerservice-managedcluster.rules: For cloud resource of AKS managed clusters: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-containerservice-managedcluster/azurerm");

avm-res-datafactory-factory.rules: For cloud resource of Data Factory: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-datafactory-factory/azurerm");

avm-res-dataprotection-backupvault.rules: For cloud resource of Data Protection Backup Vault: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-dataprotection-backupvault/azurerm");

avm-res-desktopvirtualization-scalingpla.rules: For cloud resource of Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) Scaling Plan: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-desktopvirtualization-scalingplan/azurerm");

avm-res-desktopvirtualization-workspace.rules: For cloud resource of Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) Workspace: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-desktopvirtualization-workspace/azurerm");

avm-res-devcenter-devcenter.rules: For cloud resource of Dev Center: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-devcenter-devcenter/azurerm");

avm-res-devopsinfrastructure-pool.rules: For cloud resource of DevOps Pools: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-devopsinfrastructure-pool/azurerm");

avm-res-documentdb-databaseaccount.rules: For cloud resource of CosmosDB Database Account: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-documentdb-databaseaccount/azurerm");

avm-res-edge-site.rules: For cloud resource of Azure Arc Site manager: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-edge-site/azurerm");

avm-res-eventhub-namespace.rules: For cloud resource of Event Hub Namespace: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-eventhub-namespace/azurerm");

avm-res-hybridcontainerservice-provision.rules: For cloud resource of AKS Arc: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-hybridcontainerservice-provisionedclusterinstance/azurerm");

variables.agent_pool_profiles: `agent_pool_profiles` must contain at least one element;

avm-res-insights-autoscalesetting.rules: For cloud resource of Auto scale settings: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-insights-autoscalesetting/azurerm");

avm-res-keyvault-vault.rules: For cloud resource of Key Vault: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-keyvault-vault/azurerm");

avm-res-kusto-cluster.rules: For cloud resource of Kusto Clusters: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-kusto-cluster/azurerm");

variables.sku: `sku` should be set `Dev(No SLA)_Standard_D11_v2` by default;
variables.kusto_cluster_principal_assignments: `kusto_cluster_principal_assignments` should not be set by default;

avm-res-logic-workflow.rules: For cloud resource of Logic Apps (Workflow): it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-logic-workflow/azurerm");

avm-res-machinelearningservices-workspac.rules: For cloud resource of Machine Learning Services Workspace: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-machinelearningservices-workspace/azurerm");

avm-res-netapp-netappaccount.rules: For cloud resource of Azure NetApp File: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-netapp-netappaccount/azurerm");

avm-res-network-applicationgateway.rules: For cloud resource of Application Gateway: it should be configured with module(source="Azure/avm-res-network-applicationgateway/azurerm");
